title: Indigo Vamporium
description: For Seithe, there is one thing important in his young life, finding the truth of who and what he is. He's given two clues by his uncle Venix; the eagle totem and the dark mystery of the ningen. What could the connection possibly be between the subterranean race from the coldest ocean and the only bird which flies for the storm?It's only when he crosses paths with the human Tasmin that the truth dawns on him. He is all powerful, the forever living, and a singular force to be used in the war against evil.Until he meets Tasmin he does not know he is a weapon planted here for humans. Only one human at a time can harness his light, but in return he has to walk through the darkest spells of night, through perilous forests, searching for the keys to unlock his future.
author: Poppet
